source: Wisconsin Department of Veterans Affairs and 211 Wisconsin

resources.name: Wisconsin Department of Veterans Affairs
resources.description: State agency providing accredited service officers for VA claims assistance, benefits counseling, housing referrals, and employment support for Wisconsin veterans.

resources.name: 211 Wisconsin
resources.description: Free information and referral service connecting Wisconsin veterans to community resources including housing, employment, food assistance, mental health, and benefits.

resources.name: Wisconsin Veterans Housing Program
resources.description: State program providing affordable housing and transitional housing for homeless and at-risk Wisconsin veterans with supportive services.

resources.name: Milwaukee Veterans Community Center
resources.description: Comprehensive community center providing employment training, job placement, food pantry, healthcare referrals, and social activities for Wisconsin veterans.

resources.name: Wisconsin Veterans Legal Services
resources.description: University of Wisconsin law clinic providing free legal assistance to veterans for VA claims, discharge upgrades, and family law matters.

resources.name: Wisconsin Veterans Employment Services
resources.description: State employment program offering job training, job placement assistance, and career counseling for Wisconsin veterans.

resources.name: Green Bay Veterans Support Network
resources.description: Community organization providing peer support groups, mental health services, employment assistance, and substance abuse treatment for northeastern Wisconsin veterans.

resources.name: Wisconsin Food Bank
resources.description: Provides emergency food assistance to Wisconsin veterans through distribution centers and partner agencies throughout the state.

resources.name: Veterans Crisis Line - Wisconsin
resources.description: 24/7 crisis support for veterans experiencing mental health crises, suicidal thoughts, or emotional distress.

resources.name: VA Medical Center - Madison
resources.description: Federal VA medical facility providing comprehensive healthcare, mental health services, rehabilitation, and long-term care for Wisconsin veterans.
